words.fact: A persona represents the user or stakeholder who needs the feature. It answers 'As a [who]' in the user story format.
Capability describes what the user wants to do. It answers 'I want to [what]' and defines the specific functionality needed.
Benefit explains why the feature matters. It answers 'So that [why]' and connects the feature to user value.
Acceptance criteria define when the story is complete. They provide testable conditions that must be met for the story to be done.
